holidays.title: Cesar Chavez Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the life and legacy of this iconic hero, and take inspiration from his lifelong servitude.

holidays.title: Crayola Crayon Day
holidays.description: This Crayola Crayon Day, choose your favorite color from your Crayola box and ignite your creativity.

holidays.title: Dance Marathon Day
holidays.description: Have fun, stay fit, and support a good cause on this year’s Dance Marathon Day.

holidays.title: Eiffel Tower Day
holidays.description: Raise a toast to this monumental feat of construction as we celebrate Eiffel Tower Day.

holidays.title: Holy Tuesday
holidays.description: Get informed about this important day with our informative article about Holy Tuesday.

holidays.title: Hug a Medievalist Day
holidays.description: Be ready to hug a medievalist on this special day and make them feel loved!

holidays.title: Mahavir Jayanti
holidays.description: It's Mahavir Jayanti, so get ready to celebrate as we commemorate Mahavira's birth in style!

holidays.title: National Après Day
holidays.description: #AprèsAnywhere and celebrate with Breckenridge Bourbon Whiskey, after anything you’ve accomplished!

holidays.title: National Bunsen Burner Day
holidays.description: We celebrate National Bunsen Burner Day on March 31, remembering the history of science and the inventor behind this important tool. Found in every high-school…

holidays.title: National Clams on the Half Shell Day
holidays.description: Seafood lovers won’t clam up about their love for clams today.

holidays.title: National Crayon Day
holidays.description: Spark fond memories of childhood creations in full color as we celebrate the beloved crayon!

holidays.title: National Farm Workers Day
holidays.description: The labor force on a farm plays a pivotal role in bringing crops to fruition.

holidays.title: National She's Funny That Way Day
holidays.description: It’s hats off to the ladies who make us laugh out loud. Today’s your special day.

holidays.title: National Tater Day
holidays.description: We love potatoes, and you bet we are ready for it this National Tater Day.

holidays.title: Prom Day
holidays.description: Post a throwback or call up a high school friend — cherish your unforgettable prom memories.

holidays.title: She’s Funny That Way Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the women in comedy who make life worth living on She’s Funny That Way Day.

holidays.title: Terri's Day
holidays.description: A comatose woman became the center of a battle for the right to live or die.

holidays.title: Transfer Day
holidays.description: For the price of a New York penthouse, the U.S. bought the Virgin Islands.

holidays.title: Transgender Day of Visibility
holidays.description: Let’s join the trans community to celebrate not ‘fitting in’ when we yearn to stand out!

holidays.title: World Backup Day
holidays.description: What would you do if you lost everything on your computer?

holidays.title: Cesar Chavez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Thousands of workers’ lives are better thanks to this activist’s inspiring lifelong work.

holidays.title: Ewan McGregor’s Birthday
holidays.description: From indie films to major Hollywood roles, McGregor has had a rich and successful career.

holidays.title: Johann Sebastian Bach’s Birthday
holidays.description: Discover the life of this world-renowned classical genius, from his career to his personal life.

holidays.title: Kids Diana Show’s Birthday
holidays.description: Who said success has an age limit? At eight, this young YouTuber is already a star.

holidays.title: Liza Koshy’s Birthday
holidays.description: From high school Vine star to an award-winning content creator, Koshy has enjoyed non-stop success.
